data.description: A module to generate and manage website stat
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module permit to generate and manage website statistics by
    using a database to store informations. It generate HTML graph, png
    stats graph and many more. It is object oriented and simply to use.
    It also permit to create and manage the database where will be
    stored statistics data. It is a higly adaptable modules, everyone
    can insert him in CGI web pages, and manage site stats by using
    methods like incrMainPage() or decrMainPage(). An advanced, admin
    interface can be coded with this modules. The created database is
    really simply with less than 10 tables and view.
